article.title: My DIY Smart Lights
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: Smart lights are the easiest and most fun way of getting into home automation, but they can be expensive!

authors.bio: Hey, I’m Tom. Check out my posts, I’m sure you’ll find something interesting…
